gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.operations
Class AbstractQueryCrawlerOperation<Q extends Query>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers.AbstractBaseWorker
      gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers.AbstractResourceConsumer
          gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers.AbstractOperation
              gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.operations.AbstractQueryCrawlerOperation<Q>
Type Parameters:
Q - Type of query being executed.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operation, Worker
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntitiesQuery2CsvOperation, QueryExporterOperation, QueryPrinterOperation
public abstract class AbstractQueryCrawlerOperation<Q extends Query>
extends AbstractOperation

An AbstractQueryCrawlerOperation is an Operation that performs work on each row of the result of a Query execution.
This operation requires a Query instance and an Operation class. The query is used to produce the rows which are used in order to provide input for the Operation. The user must implement handleRow() in order to use the current query row to give input to the operation then execute the operation.
